definitions.definition: The condition quality of being frail , physically, mentally, or morally; weakness of resolution ; liability to be deceived .
A fault proceeding from weakness ; foible ; sin of infirmity .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The condition quality of being frail , physically, mentally, or morally; weakness of resolution ; liability to be deceived .
secondary_definitions: A fault proceeding from weakness ; foible ; sin of infirmity .
